properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 6:57PM CST until January 14 at 2:30PM CST by NWS Little Rock AR
properties.description:
...From the National Weather Service in Little Rock...the Flood
Warning continues for the following river in Arkansas...

Eleven Point River Near Ravenden Springs affecting Randolph County


River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall
forecasted to occur over the next 48 hours. During periods of
flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall
forecasts.

Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our
Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at...
www.weather.gov/lzk
Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Eleven Point River Near Ravenden Springs.
* from Saturday afternoon to Tuesday afternoon...Or until the warning
is cancelled.
* At  5:45 PM Friday the stage was 4.2 feet.
* Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 15.0 feet.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by tomorrow early afternoon and
continue to rise to near 18.5 feet by early Sunday morning. The
river will fall below flood stage by Monday morning.
* Impacts at 18.0 feet...Farmland flooded. County roads flooded. Water
may be over portions of State Highway 90.


Fld     Observed        Forecast 6 AM        Crest
Location     Stg   Stg  Day Time   Sat   Sun   Mon  Crest Time  Date

Eleven Point River
Ravenden S  15   4.2 Fri 06 PM   9.2  18.4  15.5   18.5 12 AM 01/12
properties.instruction:
Safety message...Remember to Turn Around...Don't Drown
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.

Everyone with property or other interest along streams and rivers
should remain alert to changing weather forecasts. Should conditions
change...Look for river forecasts or Flood Warnings for use in making
informed decisions to protect life and property.
